column4: Can anyone help me? My top bar on all my windows is grey, I can't move them nor do I have minimize, maximize, or close.
yeah I can move them now
only on none, not on normal
go into ccsm and enable move windows
you disabled compiz and it was okay then re-enabled compiz with the move windows plug in enabled and same behaviour? what else you have on that system? awn or something else? how much ram
512mb ram - nothing but rar unrar and vlc
and you followed the steps I outlined? that is odd
how about closing those windows and refreshing the desktop and trying again once you have disabled and re-enabled compiz--how did you disable compiz by the way
type alt f2 (keys) then type in the box metacity --replace
